info.title: HackR API
info.description: Here is my Swagger documentation for my HackR API

post.description: Create a new user account by providing a name, email, and password. The password is validated to ensure it's not too common.

error.example: The password you provided is too common. Please choose a more secure password.

message.example: Validation failed for one or more fields.

post.description: Authenticate a user using their email and password, and return a JWT token upon success.

get.description: Retrieve the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

post.summary: Retrieve information using a search query
post.description: Fetches search results from an external API based on the provided search query.

requestBody.description: Input parameters for the search operation.

search.description: The search query string to fetch results for.

401.description: User not authenticated or lacking required permissions.

post.summary: Simulate a high traffic load on a target server
post.description: This feature performs a load test by sending a specified number of HTTP requests to a given URL. The test results include HTTP status codes and response reasons. Authentication and role verification are required.

requestBody.description: Input parameters for the load test.

url.description: The target URL to load test.

requests.description: The number of requests to send to the target URL.

results.description: Details of each HTTP request sent during the load test.

status.description: HTTP status code of the response.

reason.description: HTTP reason phrase of the response.

401.description: User not authenticated or lacking required permissions.

422.description: Validation error due to missing or invalid input data.

error.example: The url and requests fields are required.

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the load test.

error.description: Error message describing the internal server issue.
error.example: An error occurred: Connection timed out

get.summary: Retrieve subdomains of a given domain

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain name to fetch subdomains for.

403.description: Access forbidden due to insufficient permissions.

error.example: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela.

post.summary: Spam multiple emails to a recipient
post.description: This feature allows sending a specified number of emails to a recipient with a custom subject and content. The user must be authenticated and have the necessary permissions.

recipient_email.description: The email address of the recipient

subject.description: The subject of the spam emails

content.description: The content of the spam emails
content.example: This is a spam email for testing purposes.

count.description: The number of emails to send

400.description: Validation errors or invalid request data

error.example: User not authenticated or insufficient permissions

get.description: This feature verifies an email address.

error.example: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela.

400.description: Bad request or email verification failed.

get.description: Generates a fake identity and returns the generated data.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the necessary permissions

example.error: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela.

get.description: Fetches a random image from an external service and returns it.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the necessary permissions

example.error: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to fetch the image

error.example: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela, seul l'admin peut le faire.
Erreur lors de la récupération des logs

200.description: List of logs for the user

error.example: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela, seul l'admin peut le faire.
Erreur lors de la récupération des logs

200.description: List of logs for the functionality

error.example: Vous n'avez pas le droit pour faire cela, seul l'admin peut le faire.
Erreur lors de la récupération des logs

post.description: Check if a password is common from a predefined list.

password.description: The password to check if it is common.

error.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

get.description: Generates a secure password containing at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character. The default password length is 12 characters, but you can specify a different length.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The length of the generated password (default is 12 if not provided)

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have the right to generate a password

post.description: Phishing attack to capture user credentials.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to inject the script.

200.description: HTML page with the phishing script injected.

post.summary: Assign or modify rights for a role
post.description: Assigns or modifies the rights of a role for a specific functionality.

role_id.description: ID of the role to be assigned

400.description: Bad Request - The right already exists

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have the right to assign roles
